snippet.title: Welcome to Advance Wars By Web!
snippet.description:
Play Advance Wars By Web for FREE: https://awbw.amarriner.com

Advance Wars By Web Discord: https://discord.com/rPpWT2x
Advance Wars By Web subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/AWBW/

AWBW is a FREE fan-made site where you can play Advance Wars online against other players from around the world on any device using a simple "point and click" interface in a web browser. It is designed with the 'mail chess' concept in mind, where players can take their turns whenever they are available to do so. Games are typically played at a slower pace over the course of several days or weeks, but live games played in one sitting are also supported!

AWBW is primarily based on Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising, but also incorporates additional elements from Advance Wars: Dual Strike. This includes all units, COs, game mechanics, and more, for a completely unique Advance Wars experience.

Additionally, there are 11 new custom armies to choose from, allowing for games and maps that have up to a total of 16 players. You can search and play on any map from AWBW's library of thousands of user-created maps, or create your own for others to play on!
